title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
In this Best of The Herd, Colin saw there was no chance for the Denver Nuggets to succeed in San Francisco after playing in front of the Warriors raucous crowd.  Also, the Utah Jazz gig is a good job, but not a great job. Finally, former NBA veteran Al Harrington stop by to share his observations on the early stages of the NBA playoffs. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
